entry.title: web-infra-dev/midscene
entry.summary:
An AI-powered automation SDK can control the page, perform assertions, and extract data in JSON format using natural language.

Midscene.js

Joyful UI Automation

Midscene.js is an AI-powered automation SDK can control the page, perform assertions, and extract data in JSON format using natural language.

Features âœ¨

  • Natural Language Interaction ğŸ‘†: Describe the steps, and let Midscene plan and control the user interface for you
  • Understand UI, Answer in JSON ğŸ”: Provide prompts regarding the desired data format, and then receive the expected response in JSON format.
  • Intuitive Assertion ğŸ¤”: Make assertions in natural language; itâ€™s all based on AI understanding.
  • Out-of-box LLM ğŸª“: It is fine to use public multimodal LLMs like GPT-4o. There is no need for any custom training.
  • Visualized Report ğŸï¸: With our visualized report file, you can easily understand and debug the whole process.
  • Brand New Experience! ğŸ”¥: Experience a whole new world of automation development. Enjoy!

Resources ğŸ“„
